title: US Medical Whistleblowers And The COVID “Vaccine” (NANO NANO)
cleaned_text: Publisher’s Note: Regular readers of Vermont Independent are familiar with the work of Dr. Carrie Madej and Dr. Andrew Kaufman, two US doctors of conscience who are now blowing the whistle on this COVIDstrophe. Here, these two medical professionals explore the history and efficacy of vaccines globally, the proposed new COVID “vaccine” and the role of hydrogel and other nano technologies in altering human RNA/DNA , and the role of DARPA and other government programs in funding and deploying these radical new technologies. Given Operation “Warp Speed” (discussed here yesterday), this information seems timely and important. Informed consent and medical freedom are our watchwords. V for Vermont!
